title: Martin Fletcher: Trump is borrowing from Netanyahu's playbook on media attacks
description: Former NBC Tel Aviv Bureau Chief Martin Fletcher joins to discuss his new novel "Promised Land," which tells the story of two brothers and a refugee during Israel's first years after World War II.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
